As it should! Requesting political asylum is a real legal way to immigrate. As a tax paying US citizen. I am furious that my governmrnt treated people/families fleeing violence in such a horrible way.

Should also note that this was not a Biden Admin proposal but a leak from a discussion about how to deal with the 1,000 lawsuits created by the illegal and inhuman imprisonment of the children. 

So a Trump/GOP'er who got access to the discussions puts out the most extreme take on it which is further distorted by right wing media, Fox, WSJ, et al.

Wouldn't they have to change the Flores-Resettlement Act law first?  The Flores Re-Settlement act was signed into law by Bill Clinton, and Biden was one of the drafters of the Act in 1997. 

Children were being trafficked over the border, and it was so bad, that Biden helped write this bill that would protect them. The Flores Settlement Act provides that any adults caught smuggling children over the border, would be separated until parenthood could be established or the parents found.  You couldn't just smuggle children over the border. It PROTECTS the children. 1 in 4 children smuggled over the border TODAY are NOT with their parents!!.  They are stolen in central American countries and trafficked into the US by smugglers known as 'coyotes'.

Yes, to protect the children, they are housed separately from the adults until parenthood is established. DNA testing is done in the facilities to make it as fast as possible. If the adult is found to NOT be the parent, the children are kept in the facility until their real parents can be located.

Instead of just paying everyone this large sum of money that must be paid because of this law, the law has to be repealed first, because its still on the books.  The law currently says the children must be housed separately, so they can't stop separating them until the law is changed.

Flores Settlement Agreement, 1997. Biden was on the committee to write it, he should know about it.
